GameData.LocalizedText:
The Chosen People
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points in the [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.
The Coming Messiah
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point in [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in [ICON_Buildings] Monument.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.
The Seal of the Prophets
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point in the [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to 20% of a [ICON_Unit] Military Unit's [ICON_Production] Production cost when produced.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith in [ICON_Buildings] Shrine.
Cult of Saint George
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point in the [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Producing a [ICON_DISTRICT_ENCAMPMENT] Encampment, [ICON_DISTRICT_HARBOR] Harbor, [ICON_DISTRICT_AERODROME] Aerodrome, or [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site, if a City or the player is following or founded a [ICON_Religion] Religion creates an [ICON_Unit] Armed Pilgrim.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production in [ICON_Buildings] Barracks or Stables.
Teacher Beneath the Bodhi Tree
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy points per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain +1 [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture from City-State Suzerainty.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every [ICON_Envoy] Envoy sent to an existing City-State.
Zurvan the Neutrality
[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Gold] Gold discount on purchasing tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Producing a [ICON_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB] Commercial Hub or [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site, if a City or the player is following or founded a [ICON_Religion] Religion creats a [ICON_Unit] Cataphract.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+3 [ICON_Faith] Faith in [ICON_Buildings] Market.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+3 [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_Buildings] Shrine.
Ahura Mazda the Good
[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Gold] Gold discount on purchasing tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant points in [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.
Gitche Manitou
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Builders may plant [ICON_Terrain] Woods at the [ICON_Culture] Mysticism Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 Appeal on all tiles in a City.
The Thunder Bird
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Builders may plant [ICON_Terrain] Woods at the [ICON_Culture] Mysticism Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith on tiles with Breathtaking Appeal.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Power] Power in all Cities.
Wakan Tanka
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Builders may plant [ICON_Terrain] Woods at the [ICON_Culture] Mysticism Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Faith] Faith when harvesting [ICON_Charges] Resources or Features.
Sedna
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Builders may plant [ICON_Terrain] Woods at the [ICON_Culture] Mysticism Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_HARBOR] Harbors gain standard [ICON_Gold] Gold adjacency to [ICON_Terrain] Woods.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith on [ICON_Charges] Fishing Boats.
Quetzalcoatl the Feathered Serpent
[ICON_Bullet]Killing enemy [ICON_Unit] Units earns +2 [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General, [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral, [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer, [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant, [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points.
Tlatoani Huitzilopochtli
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Land Units that kill enemy [ICON_Unit] Units earn +1 [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General point; [ICON_Unit] Naval Units that kill enemy [ICON_Unit] Units earn +1 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral point.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to 15% of a killed enemy [ICON_Unit] Unit's [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength; bonus doubled if within 8 tiles of any [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.
Tlatoani Tlaloc
[ICON_Bullet]Killing enemy [ICON_Unit] Units earns +3 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer points.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_DISTRICT_AQUEDUCT] Aqueduct.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Production] Production and [ICON_Faith] Faith on [ICON_Charges] Farms adjacent to [ICON_DISTRICT_AQUEDUCT] Aqueduct.
Tlatoani Yacatecuhtli
N/A
Kukulkan the Feathered Serpent
[ICON_Bullet]Non-Capital Cities within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +15% [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Production] Production, [ICON_Gold] Gold, and [ICON_Faith] Faith; Cities beyond 6 tiles gain +10% [ICON_Faith] Faith.
Tepal Buluc Chabtan
[ICON_Bullet]Non-Capital Cities within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +15% [ICON_Science] Science.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Science] Science equal to 33% of a killed enemy [ICON_Unit] Unit's [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength; bonus doubled if within 7 tiles of any [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site; bonus doubled if within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital.
Tepal Chaac
[ICON_Bullet]Non-Capital Cities within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +30% [ICON_Food] Food.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Sites next to [ICON_Terrain] Rivers gain +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities and [ICON_Housing] Housing, as well as +4 [ICON_Food] Food.
Tepal Ixchel
[ICON_Bullet]Non-Capital Cities within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +15% [ICON_Culture] Culture.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Terrain] Rainforest tiles have a net +2 Appeal.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold on tiles with Charming Appeal; +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture on tiles with Breathtaking Appeal.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theater Square, [ICON_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE] Industrial Zone, [ICON_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB] Commercial Hub, and [ICON_DISTRICT_HARBOR] Harbor gain standard adjacency to [ICON_Terrain] Mountains.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.
